GSD.description:
ALSA: emu10k1: Fix out of bounds access in snd_emu10k1_pcm_channel_alloc()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.328 by commit 637c5310acb48fffcc5657568db3f3e9bc719bfa. For more details please see the references link.
